Package org.lgdcloudsim.core

package org.lgdcloudsim.core
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lgdcloudsim.core.events
     
  • Class
    Description
    ChangeableId
    An interface for objects that have to be identified by an id and that such id can be changed.
    CloudInformationService
    A Cloud Information Service (CIS) also named as cloud administrator, It is the overall administrator of the system and the cloud administrator of each collaboration zone.
    CloudSim
    An abstract class to manage Cloud Computing simulations, providing all methods to start, pause and stop them.
    CloudSimEntity
    Represents a simulation entity.
    CloudSimTag
    Tags indicating a type of action that needs to be undertaken by CloudSim entities when they receive or send events.
    DatacenterEntity
    An interface to be implemented by classes that have a reference to a Datacenter object.
    Factory
    An interface that implements a method factory.
    FactorySimple
    A simple factory that implements the Factory interface.
    Identifiable
    An interface for objects that have to be identified by an id.
    Nameable
    An interface for objects that have to be identified by an id and that also have a name.
    SimEntity
    An interface that represents a simulation entity.
    SimEntity.State
    Defines the event state.
    SimEntityNull
    A base interface used internally to implement the Null Object Design Pattern for interfaces extending SimEntity.
    Simulation
    An interface to be implemented by a class that manages simulation execution, controlling all the simulation life cycle.
    SimulationNull
    A class that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Simulation class.
